name: Halfbrick Sports: Football
summary: Get ready for the ultimate arcade football experience! In this action-packed 3v3 soccer game, you’ll dodge, tackle, and score goals with all the fast-paced chaos you expect from Halfbrick+. Every 3v3 soccer match is a thrilling football battle—can you outsmart your opponents and lead your team to victory?
